name: Project: Manage
description:
Story: 

You play as the project manager in a team of indie game developers. It is your responsibility to remind the team when to start and when to stop. Each member has a different burn out rate and can produce at different speeds. You don't really mind, and you also try to inspire your colleagues. 

You have a special communication device that you made for each teammate. It lets you know their current status. So if they are working on something, if they are stressed, or if they are feeling motivated by something you said.

You'll be able to review the status of everyone's tasks. Once all the tasks are completed, then the game will be published! Easy, right?

Just make sure no one loses their sanity trying to make a game.

Controls: Main:
  1. Click the button on a dialog box to communicate with a colleague. 
  2. Click into your messenger to type out a message. 
  3. Click the X to send the message.
  4. Valid Actions will Execute (view action list below)
Actions: Begin working on a task:
  • Start
  • start
  • START
  • go
  • Go
  • GO
  • Begin
  • begin
  • BEGIN
Stop working on a task:
  • Stop
  • stop
  • STOP
To Motivate others working on a task (gives bonuses):
  • You can do it
  • You are incredible
  • This is amazing
  • amazing
  • terrific
  • beautiful
  • never stop
  • keep going
